getClaimableID(address,uint256).notice: Returns the asset ID at specified position in the claim.

hasClaim(address).notice: Returns true if address has a claim, false if not.

userdoc.notice: A Claim represents an asset(s) IOU that can be redeemed by an address. Claims allow contracts to track the ownership of NF assets that are intended to be minted at a later date.
